sub_fields.title: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.description: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.answer:
The solution is to bring a high quality, award-winning game to market that abstracts Web3 entirely and integrates Cardano in the background. Players join and progress without needing any blockchain knowledge, while still benefiting from Cardano’s open protocol features such as tradable items, player driven value exchange, and competitive wager matches. This creates a credible and accessible path for onboarding mainstream gamers who are not Web3 savvy.

![](https://i.postimg.cc/mr6wHZrm/screenshot-864-(1).webp)

Ascent: Rivals follows a traditional gaming development and publishing path and has been validated by mainstream events and competitions. The game has won PAX Rising and DreamHack Indie Playground, two of the most selective showcases for emerging indie titles, and has been featured at Gamescom, DreamHack, GDC, Momocon, and ETH Denver Arcade. These events are curated by established developers, publishers, and industry professionals, confirming that Ascent is recognized as a competitive product within the traditional gaming market.

The game has already reached more than 15,000 hours of organic playtime, more than 4,000 wishlists, and more than 2,500 monthly active users in limited alpha testing. These results show clear traction with traditional players outside the finance focused vertical where Cardano is strongest today.

Catalyst funding will support scaling multiplayer servers and infrastructure, delivering new maps, ships, weapons, and environments, expanding visual fidelity, and developing a career mode that improves onboarding for new players. It will also support broader event participation and an expanded creator program to reach new audiences across multiple regions.

To further strengthen global expansion, we are working with Antler Ibex to establish a presence in Japan, one of the world’s largest gaming markets. The Ibex team includes seasoned operators with more than 20 years of experience across major venture, media, and entertainment organizations including LucasFilm, FujiFilm, Sony, Universal, Warner, Aniplex, Kodansha, Shogakukan, Shueisha, Kadokawa, Fuji, Shochiku, and Toho. Through this partnership, we aim to explore collaboration with leading Japanese IP and support Cardano’s visibility within Japan’s high value entertainment ecosystem.

Once players are in game, Cardano operates quietly in the background. Players create or link wallets through Steam, Xbox, or PlayStation accounts without learning Web3 terminology. Gameplay activity naturally creates on-chain interactions through cosmetics purchases, tournaments, sponsorship payouts, team ownership, wagers, and marketplace exchanges. A dedicated spectator and tournament platform expands participation for communities, organizers, and sponsors by allowing them to host events, promote teams, and run competitive circuits similar to traditional esports.

Partnerships with MSI, Starforge, Shelby, Saleen, Dirtfish, and AccelByte provide global reach and demonstrate enterprise level confidence in Ascent as a traditional game that uses Cardano only where it enhances user experience and value.

By scaling a game that already shows strong appeal to mainstream players, abstracting all Web3 complexity, enabling open protocol features, and expanding into key markets such as Japan with Antler Ibex, Ascent: Rivals offers a clear and scalable path to bring new users to Cardano. It also creates a repeatable blueprint that future studios can adopt when building high quality consumer titles on Cardano.

![](https://i.postimg.cc/8PJVJsPv/screenshot-894-(1).webp)

sub_fields.title: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.description: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.answer:
![](https://i.postimg.cc/d3JLQrKL/ascent-pax.webp)



Ascent: Rivals drives measurable on-chain activity by converting traditional gamers into active Cardano users. Wallets are created automatically through Steam, Xbox, or PlayStation, allowing players to join without needing Web3 knowledge. Gameplay, wagers, item ownership, tournaments, and rewards all generate verifiable on-chain transactions.

# **Year\-1 On\-Chain Transaction Projection**
**Wallet creation:** 50,000

**Asset mints and updates:** 250,000

**Wagers and currency swaps:** 5,475,000

_Calculated from 750 daily active players, each playing one hour per day, averaging 5 matches per hour and 4 races per match, with a value exchange per race \(in\-game currency is committed each race\)\._

**Seasonal reward claims:** 50,000

**Total Year\-1:** Approximately **5\.9 million transactions**

# **Additional KPIs**
- 1,000,000+ reach from marketing and events
- 50+ activated creators across regions
- 10,000+ tournament participants
- Four seasonal content drops
- 15,000+ marketplace listings and trades post launch

sub_fields.title: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.description: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.answer:
![](https://i.postimg.cc/vTPHQKhR/banner-(2).webp)

Our team combines a proven history of delivering high-quality games, contributing to Cardano infrastructure, and executing at industry events. The project is already validated through live public testing, awards, and partnerships, demonstrating the capability and feasibility required for successful delivery.

# **Track Record**
- Shipped commercial games, internal engines, and high-performance multiplayer systems.
- Contributions to Cardano standards including **CIP\-102** (metadata and asset interaction improvements).
- Core development involvement in **Sundial**, a next-generation Cardano rollup framework.
- Delivered to mainnet grabbit.market, a Cardano-based auction and marketplace system.
- Documented [behind the scenes footage](%5Bhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9dsoSMzfkwo&list=PLv6OI6cX9BZk93b6KSv46iK9zWTF7SL73)%5D(https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9dsoSMzfkwo&list=PLv6OI6cX9BZk93b6KSv46iK9zWTF7SL73)) of attending various events with more being edited and on the way.
- Antler Ibex is the world’s first full-service vertical growth engine for established corporates. Backed by Antler, the world’s most active early-stage VC (with 1,500+ investments globally with $1.2B AUM), and led by a seasoned team of venture and growth specialists, Ibex helps corporates strategically engage with the $3.5 trillion global venture economy to unlock growth (organic, inorganic, and transformational)

# **Team Capability**
- DigiPen alumni engineers experienced in Unreal Engine, multiplayer networking, physics, rendering, and engine-level C++ development.
- Antler Ibex senior partners to oversee program quality and corporate engagement at the executive level.
- Transparent public professional profiles, including LinkedIn references for all founders and contributors.
- Capable of simultaneously delivering production content, Cardano integrations, and global growth initiatives.

# **Feasibility**
- Playable today on Steam through a public, limited alpha with more than **15,000 hours** of organic gameplay.
- Thousands of wishlists and stable monthly active players validating core gameplay and retention.
- Winner of **PAX Rising**, a leading predictor for major indie awards.
- Showcased at DreamHack Indie Playground, Gamescom, GDC, ETH Denver, Momocon, and multiple PAX events.
- Only Web3-enabled game of its category featured live on Steam.
- Broad ecosystem partnerships, reinforcing the feasibility of scaling both game and Cardano integrations.

**Conclusion**

Our combined execution history, ecosystem contributions, award recognition, and live user validation demonstrate clear capacity to deliver Ascent: Rivals with high trust and accountability. The project’s feasibility is already proven through tangible progress, real users, and market traction, ensuring strong alignment with Cardano’s adoption goals.

sub_fields.title: Milestone Outputs
sub_fields.description: What will be delivered in this milestone
sub_fields.answer:
- Core gameplay systems are finalized, including ship handling, combat interactions, collision, environmental hazards, and round logic, all implemented in a stable and feature-locked state that allows consistent play sessions and prepares the foundation required for content expansion, wallet integration, and creator-driven testing later in the project.
- A stability pass is completed across physics, networking, matchmaking, and session flow, ensuring that all core mechanics behave predictably under load and enabling the team to confidently proceed into adding new maps, ships, cosmetic systems, and onboarding flows without risking regression to the core experience established here.

sub_fields.title: Acceptance Criteria
sub_fields.description: Specific conditions that must be met
sub_fields.answer:
- Core gameplay features operate without major blocking bugs or regressions; all fundamental mechanics behave consistently across multiple test sessions, with documented performance metrics demonstrating alignment with expected framerates, latency thresholds, and gameplay responsiveness under realistic multiplayer scenarios.
- Internal playtest cohorts report high stability and coherence in gameplay flow, with minimal crash reports, consistent synchronization across clients, functional session loops, and validated baseline telemetry that shows survival of extended test cycles without major drops in performance, engagement, or technical integrity.

sub_fields.title: Evidence of Completion
sub_fields.description: How you will demonstrate achievement
sub_fields.answer:
- QA reports, internal playtest recordings, and stability logs demonstrating that core gameplay systems function reliably across representative hardware and matchmaking scenarios, with no critical issues preventing player progression or session continuity during extended testing cycles.
- Exported telemetry dashboards showing successful capture of gameplay events, frame-time consistency, network stability, and user interactions, alongside documentation confirming the completion of the feature-lock checklist and readiness for the content expansion and creator testing phases of Milestone 2.

sub_fields.title: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.description: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.answer:
This project represents strong value for the Cardano ecosystem:



- **High-Volume User Onboarding:** With 700,000 ADA, the project delivers a global beta of Ascent: Rivals, onboarding large numbers of traditional gamers who are outside Cardano’s current finance-centric demographic. This directly expands the ecosystem’s reach to one of the largest consumer sectors in digital entertainment.

- **Significant On-Chain Transaction Growth:** The game’s wager systems, cosmetic economies, marketplace trades, and seasonal reward flows are projected to generate millions of transactions in Year 1. These interactions create recurring utility for ADA and demonstrate Cardano’s capability to support consumer-scale applications.

- **Leverage of Existing Investment:** The core game development is already funded by the team. Catalyst funds primarily scale user acquisition, content, and Cardano integration. This multiplies the impact of the requested funding because the foundational product exists and is already live-tested.

- **Reusable Model for Future Studios:** The project produces a full integration blueprint for other game studios, including wallet onboarding flows, economic logic, and scalable Cardano settlement patterns. This creates a replicable model for onboarding additional games and developers into the ecosystem.

- **Strengthened International Reach:** Through Antler Ibex and global creator networks, the project expands Cardano visibility in Japan, North America, Europe, and APAC. Penetration into these markets increases brand credibility and opens pathways to broader partnerships and IP integrations.

- **Alignment With Core Catalyst Priorities:** The project drives real users, real transactions, and measurable adoption while showcasing Cardano to mainstream gamers and international entertainment markets. It demonstrates a high-value use of Catalyst resources by delivering concrete metrics and long-term ecosystem lift.



**In summary:** For 700,000 ADA, the Cardano ecosystem gains a globally launched beta, millions of projected on-chain interactions, a proven onboarding pipeline for mainstream gamers, and a repeatable model for future game studios—representing a high-impact, high-leverage investment for Catalyst.
